text: Aurora Aksnes, stage name "AURORA", is a Norwegian singer, songwriter and record producer. Born on the 15th of June, 1996, in Stavanger, Norway, she was brought up with two elder sisters: Miranda and Viktoria Aksnes. She is now situated in Bergen, Norway, and can speak in both fluent Norwegian and English. Aksnes has released 5 studio albums, the most recent being What Happened To The Heart, released in 2024. Her most widely known song is Runaway (from the album All My Demons Greeting Me As A Friend), released in 2014. She has also appeared in various interviews. Aksnes' MBTI personality type is INFP (introverted, intuitive, feeling, perceiving). She can play the piano as well as vocals, and, as revealed in a 2021 interview conducted by the Australian Broadcasting Corporation (ABC), she can do quite an extraordinary carrot biting impression, which she claims as "one of my many mouth talents". == Other websites == *https://www.aurora-music.com/ *https://www.facebook.com/iamAURORA/ *https://www.instagram.com/auroramusic/?hl=en *https://x.com/i/flow/login?redirect_after_login=%2Fbest_of_aurora *https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNjHgaLpdy1IMNK57pYiKiQ Category:Norwegian singer-songwriters Category:Norwegian record producers Category:People from Stavanger Category:1996 births Category:Living people
title: Aurora (singer)
